channel.title: Comments on: Pineapple Sorbet and Tropical Granita with Fruit Salad

item.title: By: Isabella
item.dc:creator: Isabella
item.description: Wow, what an amazingly refreshing looking dessert. You would not feel guilty eating that as it looks so healthy for you!!! Well done Anita, I will certainly give your dessert a vote in the competition and I hope you win!!
item.content:encoded: Wow, what an amazingly refreshing looking dessert. You would not feel guilty eating that as it looks so healthy for you!!! Well done Anita, I will certainly give your dessert a vote in the competition and I hope you win!!

item.title: By: Barbara
item.dc:creator: Barbara
item.description: Simple lovely photos, Anita! My dad used to make the most divine pineapple sherbet. I'll have to dig out his recipe!
item.content:encoded: Simple lovely photos, Anita! My dad used to make the most divine pineapple sherbet. I’ll have to dig out his recipe!

item.title: By: Beta Gal
item.dc:creator: Beta Gal
item.description: I love your presentation in the leaf shaped dish. I hope the weather catches up to your delicious dessert!
item.content:encoded: I love your presentation in the leaf shaped dish. I hope the weather catches up to your delicious dessert!

item.title: By: Mother-in-law
item.dc:creator: Mother-in-law
item.description:
Ooh YUMMM!
Keeping fingers crossed for the competitions you have entered. I'll vote for you and I hope you'll also get the votes of your many readers. Keep cooking and baking. It's good for all of us that you do!
item.content:encoded:
Ooh YUMMM!

Keeping fingers crossed for the competitions you have entered. I’ll vote for you and I hope you’ll also get the votes of your many readers.
Keep cooking and baking. It’s good for all of us that you do!

item.title: By: Cassandra @aperfectpantry
item.dc:creator: Cassandra @aperfectpantry
item.description: Oh my gosh, that looks amazing! I have been using my ice cream maker to death with Summer weather approaching. I am keen to give this one a try, looks fantastic!
item.content:encoded: Oh my gosh, that looks amazing! I have been using my ice cream maker to death with Summer weather approaching. I am keen to give this one a try, looks fantastic!

item.title: By: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.dc:creator: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.description: The tropical granita sounds amazing – I love passionfruit. Your roses sound delightful too.
item.content:encoded: The tropical granita sounds amazing – I love passionfruit. Your roses sound delightful too.
